about_the_game:
Make sure you’re wearing your Sunday best, even when fighting off hordes of the undead!

Look the bee’s knees with the Dashing Outfits Pack, available exclusively with the Digital Deluxe Edition! Including swanky new outfits for Frank, Gracie, Nalangu, and Archimedes, this pack is ideal for the budding adventurer looking to stand out from the crowd while sending mummies back to the underworld.
detailed_description:
Make sure you’re wearing your Sunday best, even when fighting off hordes of the undead!

Look the bee’s knees with the Dashing Outfits Pack, available exclusively with the Digital Deluxe Edition! Including swanky new outfits for Frank, Gracie, Nalangu, and Archimedes, this pack is ideal for the budding adventurer looking to stand out from the crowd while sending mummies back to the underworld.

name: Strange Brigade - Dashing Outfits Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 2200G or Intel CPU Core i3-2100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2GB) or NVIDIA GeForce 750 Ti (2GB)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or Intel CPU Core i7-3770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX570 or Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 1070

short_description: Make sure you’re wearing your Sunday best, even when fighting off hordes of the undead!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
